translation.title: Placing the Mind and Keeping it Connected

segments.en: 3. Placing the Mind and Keeping it Connected
“And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?

segments.pli: Savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhi—ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo … pe ….
segments.en: Immersion with placing the mind and keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind, but just keeping it connected. Immersion without placing the mind or keeping it connected. …”
